Description: Fragment of a wooden coffin; paint on plaster; two rows of blue Hieroglyphic text.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Curator's comments: The top edge of the board is painted red.
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 131, 230)
